praetor.name: Praetor
praetor.description:
Welcome to The Praetorium. You are the Praetor.

Traits and abilities:
- Revelation: You are publicly known to be the Praetor.
- Recruitment: Every night, you may recruit a player to turn them into a Recruited Member of the Praetorium.
- Invincible: You may not be lynched or killed by any means.
Factional Communication: You may communicate with members of the Praetorium Cabinet every night in private.

Win condition:
- You win when every single member alive is aligned to the Praetorium, with no more than three recruited members, in which case you will lose.

emissary.name: Emissary
emissary.description:
Welcome to The Praetorium. You are an Emissary.

Traits and abilities:
- Communicate: Every night, you may communicate with a recruited member of the Praetorium in private.
Factional Communication: You may communicate with members of the Praetorium Cabinet every night in private.

Win condition:
- You win when every single member alive is aligned to the Praetorium, with no more than three recruited members, in which case you will lose.

quaestor.name: Quaestor
quaestor.description:
Welcome to The Praetorium. You are a Quaestor.

Traits and abilities:
- Accolade: Every night, you may accolade a non-Praetorium member a role, which can be that of a cop, a vigilante, or a roleblocker of your choice. Failure to do so for three nights per game will result in your identity being revealed publicly.
Factional Communication: You may communicate with members of the Praetorium Cabinet every night in private.

Win condition:
- You win when every single member alive is aligned to the Praetorium, with no more than three recruited members, in which case you will lose.

zealot.name: Zealot
zealot.description:
Welcome to The Praetorium. You are a Zealot.

Traits and abilities:
- Foresight (passive): At the beginning of each day, you will learn if the Praetor's recruitment was successful. If the Praetor's recruitment was unsuccessful, you will learn the name of the person who blocked it.
Factional Communication: You may communicate with members of the Praetorium Cabinet every night in private.

Win condition:
- You win when every single member alive is aligned to the Praetorium, with no more than three recruited members, in which case you will lose.

cleric.name: Cleric
cleric.description:
Welcome to The Praetorium. You are a Cleric.

Traits and abilities:
- Sacrifice: Every night, you may attempt to kill a recruited member of the Praetorium.
Factional Communication: You may communicate with members of the Praetorium Cabinet every night in private.

Win condition:
- You win when every single member alive is aligned to the Praetorium, with no more than three recruited members, in which case you will lose.
